derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from the modern Latin genus name of the foxglove, from digitalis (herba) ('plant) relating to the finger', from digitus 'finger, toe'; suggested by German Fingerhut 'thimble or foxglove'

means.word_mean: 1. a powerful cardiac stimulant obtained from foxglove
2. any of several plants of the genus Digitalis
